SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.listeners

Interface ModelListener

All Superinterfaces:
BoardListener, BookshelfListener, GameListener, PlayerListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerImpl
public interface ModelListener extends GameListener, BookshelfListener, BoardListener, PlayerListener
An interface used to represent an object of type 'listener'. In this case the listener registers itself to the Model. When the view is subject to changes the listener permits the model to respond to them.

  • Method Summary
